doc:
Hurd Hatfield https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hurd_Hatfield 0 William Rukard Hurd Hatfield (December 7, 1917 – December 26, 1998) was an American actor. He was best known for often playing characters of handsome, narcissistic young men, most notably Dorian Gray in the film The Picture of Dorian Gray (1945). William_Rukard_Hurd_Hatfield ( December_7_,_1917 – December_26_,_1998 ) was an_American_actor . He was_best_known for often_playing characters of handsome_,_narcissistic_young_men , most_notably Dorian_Gray in the_film The_Picture of Dorian_Gray_(_1945_) .
